subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amid the tempered expectations that come from a churned roster, the Liberty opened its season Saturday night with a 91-74 loss to the Connecticut Sun, which has made consecutive appearances in the W.N.B.A. finals.
snippet: Amid the tempered expectations that come from a churned roster, the Liberty opened its season Saturday night with a 91-74 loss to the Connecticut Sun, which has made consecutive appearances in the W.N.B.A. finals.
